text: Drug preparations were indistinguishable from one another and the packaging of the trial products was randomized and blinded (26) . Both GH doses were injected using a GH injection device (NordiPen ® 5 and PenNeedle ® ; Novo Nordisk A/S, Bagsvaerd, Denmark) to maintain blinding.
sentences: Drug preparations were indistinguishable from one another and the packaging of the trial products was randomized and blinded (26) .
Both GH doses were injected using a GH injection device (NordiPen ® 5 and PenNeedle ® ; Novo Nordisk A/S, Bagsvaerd, Denmark) to maintain blinding.
